summary.span: 使用 命名空间，可以将自定义升级行为编程入 ClickOnce 应用程序。

span.span: With the namespace, you can program custom upgrade behavior into your ClickOnce application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的键类为。The key class in this namespace is . 您可以使用或 方法测试您的部署是否具有可用的更新; 后一种方法会在成功完成后引发事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or methods; the latter method raises the event when it has successfully completed. 返回有关更新的重要信息，例如更新的版本号以及当前用户是否需要更新。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新，则可以使用或安装它; 后一种方法在更新安装完成后引发事件。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is finished. 对于较大的更新，可以通过和事件接收进度通知，并使用中的信息通知用户下载状态。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 你还可以使用按需下载大型文件和程序集。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 在部署的应用程序清单中必须将这些文件标记为 "可选"，以使其不会在安装时下载。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest, so that they are not downloaded at installation. 可以通过使用或方法在应用程序持续时间内随时下载文件。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or methods. 通过为 类的事件提供事件处理程序，可以在将程序集加载到内存中之前下载程序集。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：在设计器中使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 按需下载程序集](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5).
